Interface UnifiedStore

This is a temporary interface used to unify old-style stores (storage/StorageProviderBase) and new-style stores (storageNG/Store). We should be able to remove this once we've switched across to the NG stack.

Note that for old-style stores, StorageStubs are used sometimes to represent storage which isn't activated. For new-style stores, Store itself represents an inactive store, and needs to be activated using activate(). This will present some integration challenges :)

Note also that old-style stores use strings for Storage Keys, while NG storage uses storageNG/StorageKey subclasses. This provides a simple test for determining whether a store is old or new.
